apple_vendor_description: This romantic emoji on Apple devices portrays a loving kiss between a man and a woman, both rendered with rich, dark skin tones and Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that imparts a luxurious depth. The gentle inclination of their heads and the soft glow on their cheeks, achieved through Apple's masterful realistic lighting, evoke a sense of profound affection.  The smooth, rounded contours of their faces, a defining characteristic of Apple's emoji design, make this a powerful and beautiful symbol of love and intimacy for use in messages on Apple devices.
